data.eml:eml: Two remarkable new species of Penicillata (Diplopoda, Polyxenida) from Table Mountain National Park (Cape Town, South Africa)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Duy-Jacquemin, Monique Nguyen, Uys, Charmaine, Geoffroy, Jean-Jacques (2011): Two remarkable new species of Penicillata (Diplopoda, Polyxenida) from Table Mountain National Park (Cape Town, South Africa). ZooKeys 156: 85-103, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.156.2211, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.156.2211
